title: The Desert
creator_credit: Michael Birch and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Introduces the desert biome; its geographical locations, the causes of its formation, its temperature conditions and consequent aridity; its dust storms, and its rains. Shows the diversity of the plants and animals of the desert and how they adapt to their arid environment.
